channel.title: Client background image help
channel.description: ok im using battlescape source and client its 317 and i know with this you have to like use image packer or something to change the client bakground image but ive been searching for hours i have no idea wat to do can someone please help me i have teamviewer and skype

item.title: Client background image help
item.dc:creator: @RelicFX RelicFX
item.description:
@RelicFX wrote:

  1. GGo into client
    open sprites folder
    Change background.jpg/png go your background

NOTE : your background need the same name like the background in the sprites folder

exemple is the background on sprites background.jpg than your background has to be background.jpg eather to replace it

Read full topic
